import React, { Component } from 'react' import '../CSS/Login.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faUser, faUserPlus } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default class Login extends Component { state = { name: '', user: '', password: '', email:'', contact: '', address: '' } signup = () => { fetch('http://localhost:8080/users', { method: 'post', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(this.state) }).then((resp) => { resp.json().then((result) => { // console.log(result) alert('Resturant has been Added') }) }) } render() { return (
